class_notes: (THIS COURESE IS FUL; email candlerregistrar@emory.edu to be placed on the waiting list; ON-CAMPUS; students who hope to take the class via live remote synchronous participation  must request permission of the instructor by emailing iamcfar@emory.edu)
course_description: Survey of figures and issues in contemporary theology, including doctrines of God, Christ, Holy Spirit, revelation, humanity, salvation, and eschatology. Opportunities for students to do constructive theology.
schedule_location: TTh 10am-11:20am in Rita Anne Rollins Building_252
